component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes;
longitude false java.lang.String -71.098326 The longitude you wish the StreetViewPanaroma to point to
latitude false java.lang.String 42.345573 The latitude you wish the StreetViewPanaroma to point to
width false java.lang.String 500 The width of the StreetViewPanaroma. Default value is 500.
height false java.lang.String 500 The height of the StreetViewPanaroma. Default value is 500.
zoom false java.lang.String 0
The zoom value of the StreetViewPanaroma. zoom defines the zoom level of this view (effectively proscribing the "field of view") with 0 being fully zoomed-out. Different Street View locations may provide higher or lower zoom levels. Default value is 0.
yaw false java.lang.String 0
The yaw value of the StreetViewPanaroma. yaw defines the rotation angle around the camera locus in degrees relative from true north. Yaw angles are measured clockwise (90 degrees is true east). Default value is 0.
pitch false java.lang.String 0
The pitch value of the StreetViewPanaroma. pitch defines the angle variance "up" or "down" from the camera's initial default pitch, which is often (but not always) flat horizontal. (For example, an image taken on a hill will likely exhibit a default pitch that is not horizontal.) Pitch angles are measured with negative values looking up (to -90 degrees straight up and orthogonal to the default pitch) and positive values looking down (to +90 degrees straight down and orthogonal to the default pitch). Default value is 0.
renderOnWindowLoad false java.lang.String true
This flag determines whether to render the StreetViewPanaroma on window load. This flag should be set to false if the map is inside a zone that will be updated by Ajax
jsVariable false java.lang.String
This flag determines the JavaScript variable you want to use for referring to the StreetViewPanaroma. It should unique. Use this attribute if you want to use write additional JavaScript code for the map to customize it.
